english.segment1: Wake every heart and every tongue. To sing the new eternal song. And crown Him King of Glory now. Confess Him, Lord of all
english.segment2: You are the highest. You are the greatest. You are the Lord of all. Angels will worship. Nations will bow down. To the Lord of all
english.segment3: A day will come when all will sing
english.segment4: And glorify our matchless King. Your name unrivalled stands alone. You are the Lord of all
english.segment5: Let every heart. Let every tongue. Sing of Your name. Sing of Your name. Let every heart. Let every tongue. Sing, sing, sing
english.segment6: Lifting You higher, higher and higher
